#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,a,b,c,d;
    cin >> t;
    while ( t-- ) {
          cin >> a >> b >> c >> d;
          if ( a%c == 0 && b%d == 0 ) {
               printf("yes\n");
               continue;
          }
          if ( a%d == 0 && b%c == 0 ) {
               printf("yes\n");
               continue;
          }
          printf("no\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
